Download Game!

[Introduction]
The Flash version of Street Fighter. Play with 12 characters against computer or 2nd player.

[Controls]
Player 1:
Up Arrow Key - Jump
Left / Right Arrow Keys - Move
Down Arrow Key - Duck
Numpad 1, 2 - Kick
Numpad 4, 5 - Punch
Numpad 7 - Dash

Player 2:
E - Jump
S / F - Move
D - Duck
H, J - Punch
B , N - Kick
K - Dash

[About]
Developer: FlashKOF
Links: http://flashkof.fr/street/site/htm/news.htm
